items.title: Is DAPT Beneficial After Valve-in-Valve TAVI?
items.description: New data suggest dual antiplatelet therapy may not be the best approach after transcatheter valve-in-valve implantation. Medscape Medical News

items.title: UK Failing Men on Prostate Cancer, Reports Warn
items.description: Experts are calling for urgent reform of prostate cancer care as new data reveal missed diagnoses and widespread treatment gaps. Medscape News UK
